content:
Dave deBronkart said:

Hi Jose Costa Teixeira - you will probably benefit from listening to the recording of today's VERY robust discussion of things like that.
https://transcripts.gotomeeting.com/#/s/f6548b3db0fff9d3d4be9b68996d16104857033cf61f25312f52f3b5da54c291

As I'm sure you know, you can speed it up until you get to the good stuff.

I'm suggesting this because with as explosively interesting as this is, ergo these wild threads, I think there's more for you to harvest in 45 minutes with that recording than 45 minutes on Zulip trying to sort it out.

It really was an action-packed meeting. Should I get it transcribed? @Debi Willis @Virginia Lorenzi @Lloyd McKenzie anyone (I have transcription software - it's good but imperfect so it needs touch-up after)
On the call today, I agreed to create a Jira ticket for FHIR-I to discuss how Tasks should best be linked into a thread. The item can be found here: https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29962

@Dave deBronkart Sorry for the delay. Just catching up on Zulip chats. If it is easy to get it transcribed, it might be beneficial to some who don't want to listen to the recording. But, i know you are very busy with other things. So...i will let others speak up if they want a transcript so you don't do work that is not necessary.
